reviewText: This movie Goodbye Uncle Tom was  a horrible exploitation of the Beautiful, Intelligent black race.  This was an evidence of people who are victims of a racist white diluted sick fearful mentality of hating the black race.  It is further evidence of the failure to acknowledge the truth of human equality and the demeaning shame of the bullying of white disillusionment.
Campy and sometimes shocking and disturbing documentary-style films.
only really watched one of the three so far...the movies are just ok for me

Good buy uncle Tom, is the best dvd of the three. Interesting take on slavery in USA mid 1800 . A lot of naked  people running around the entire movie. I don't think slavery was ever as shown in the movie, a lot of liberties taken in this movie, I think a majority of it is a result of  creative fantasy.
